thread.section_title: Flologic Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flologic | flologic.com
thread.title: Ed B

author: Ed B
title: Ed B
text:
We purchased this for a seasonal home, which was just refurbished after pipes froze and destroyed the main parts of the house. Had we had this in-place, we would have escaped the breaks with only minor damage.
Ours is hooked up to the alarm system, which will place the unit into away mode when the alarm is armed. We will also be notified through the central station if it triggers an alarm due to water flow.
